languages.text: Whenever the familiar becomes a target of an enemy's attack, the Overseer has their damage increased by +2%. The effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

languages.original_text: Когда фамильяр становится целью атаки противника, урон от способностей надзирателя увеличивается на 2%. Эффект суммируется и длится до конца боя.

languages.text: Wird der Vertraute Ziel eines feindlichen Angriffs, erhöht sich der Schaden des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} um +2 %. Der Effekt ist stapelbar und dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.
languages.original_text: Whenever the familiar becomes a target of an enemy's attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} has their damage dealt increased by +2%. The effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wird der Vertraute Ziel eines feindlichen Angriffs, erhöht sich der Schaden des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} um +2 %. Der Effekt ist stapelbar und dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le familier est la cible d'une attaque ennemie, les dégâts infligés par le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} augmentent de +2 %. Cet effet est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the familiar becomes a target of an enemy's attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} has their damage dealt increased by +2%. The effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le familier est la cible d'une attaque ennemie, les dégâts infligés par le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} augmentent de +2 %. Cet effet est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.

Chaque fois que le familier est la cible d'une attaque ennemie, les dégâts des capacités du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} augmentent de +2 %. Cet effet est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 每当使仆受到敌方攻击时，其{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}造成的伤害提高2%。此效果可叠加，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the familiar becomes a target of an enemy's attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} has their damage dealt increased by +2%. The effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当使仆受到敌方攻击时，其{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}造成的伤害提高2%。此效果可叠加，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Cuando un enemigo dirige un ataque contra el familiar, el daño infligido por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} aumenta un +2 %. El efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Whenever the familiar becomes a target of an enemy's attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} has their damage dealt increased by +2%. The effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un enemigo dirige un ataque contra el familiar, el daño infligido por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} aumenta un +2 %. El efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: ファミリアーが敵の攻撃のターゲットになると、 {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}のダメージが+2%増加する。この効果は戦闘終了までスタックし、継続する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the familiar becomes a target of an enemy's attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} has their damage dealt increased by +2%. The effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: ファミリアーが敵の攻撃のターゲットになると、監督官のアビリティダメージが+2%増加する。この効果は戦闘終了までスタックし、継続する。
ファミリアーが敵の攻撃のターゲットになると、 {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}ダメージが+2%増加する。この効果は戦闘終了までスタックし、継続する。

languages.text: İye, bir düşman saldırısının hedefi olursa {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in verdiği hasar +%2 artar. Bu etki üst üste birikir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the familiar becomes a target of an enemy's attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} has their damage dealt increased by +2%. The effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: İye, bir düşman saldırısının hedefi olursa {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen'in{/g} verdiği hasar +%2 artar. Bu etki üst üste birikir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

İye, bir düşman saldırısının hedefi olursa {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerinin{/g} verdiği hasar +%2 artar. Bu etki üst üste birikir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
